title: Phishing Detection Chrome Extension
description: A Chrome Extension that automatically detects phishing URLs using SecureBERT model with Express & Python backend. Features Google OAuth, real-time alerts, and encrypted URL logging.

title: Sage Euphoria Event Website
description: Developed a dynamic university event website using React.js with stunning animations powered by Framer Motion library for enhanced user experience.

title: Builds Your Mind (EdTech Platform)
description: MERN stack educational platform with Razorpay payment integration for course purchases, student management system, and comprehensive learning dashboard.

title: Udaan EdTech Platform
description: Another MERN-based educational platform featuring real-time course access, Razorpay integration for smooth transactions, and modern user interface.

title: Broyal.in E-commerce
description: Built a complete e-commerce platform on WordPress with inventory management, secure payment system, and optimized user shopping experience.

title: Mangrole Security Services
description: WordPress website showcasing security services with contact forms, SEO optimization, and mobile-responsive design for enhanced user engagement.

title: Uttam Facility Management
description: WordPress website for facility management services with features like service booking, client testimonials, and a blog section for updates.
